title: Spotify Publishes Content Policy, Covid-19 Hub in Response to Joe Rogan Controversy
sub_head: CEO Daniel Ek writes, ‘We have an obligation to do more to provide balance and access to widely accepted information’ about the pandemic
body:
Spotify Technology SA is publishing its content policy and creating a Covid-19 information hub in response to a growing chorus of artists and podcasters speaking out against Joe Rogan.
“We know we have a critical role to play in supporting creator expression while balancing it with the safety of our users,” said Chief Executive Daniel Ek in a blog post Sunday. “In that role, it is important to me that we don’t take on the position of being content censor while also making sure that there are rules in place and consequences for those who violate them.”
